title: Open House Featuring Manet and Modern Beauty
title_display: Open House Featuring Manet and Modern Beauty
hero_caption: Édouard Manet. Jeanne (Spring), 1881. The J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles.
list_description: Take a closer look at this much-anticipated show with members of the Sustaining Fellows, family, and friends.
description: Take a closer look at this celebrated exhibition with members of the Sustaining Fellows, family, and friends. Gloria Groom, chair of European Painting and Sculpture and David and Mary Winton Green Curator of European Painting and Sculpture, speaks about the show before an exhibition viewing and reception.
location: Rubloff Auditorium, Griffin Court, Pritzker Garden, and Regenstein Hall
buy_button_caption:
Four complimentary registrations are available per Sustaining Fellows household. Registration is required. Additional guests may be registered for $75.


Contact the Office of the Sustaining Fellows at (312) 443-3735 or sustainingfellows@artic.edu to register.
